item.title: AWS journey â€” API Gateway & Lambda & VPC performance
item.description: We decided to hide some EC2 instances in private subnets (VPC). Theyâ€™re accessible via bastion hosts or via API (API Gateway & Lambda). Works well, but thereâ€™s one weird issueâ€Šâ€”â€Šcold lambda start time is over 10s sometimes. We experienced even 15s. This is not acceptable and Iâ€™m seeking for answers to my questions.
